tests.name: test greatest with integer
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID BIGINT KEY, I1 INT, I2 INT, I3 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, GREATEST(I1, I2, I3, null, 5) AS HIGHEST FROM INPUT;

tests.name: test implicit casting to long
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID BIGINT KEY, N1 INT, N2 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic',value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, GREATEST(N1, N2) AS HIGHEST FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Function 'greatest' cannot be resolved due to ambiguous method parameters (INTEGER, BIGINT).

tests.name: test implicit casting to decimal
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID BIGINT KEY, N1 INT, N2 BIGINT, N3 DECIMAL(50,30)) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic',value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, GREATEST(N1, N2, N3) AS HIGHEST FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Function 'greatest' cannot be resolved due to ambiguous method parameters (INTEGER, BIGINT, DECIMAL(50, 30)).

tests.name: test all null input
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID BIGINT KEY) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic',value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT1 AS SELECT ID, GREATEST(null, null, null, null) AS HIGHEST FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Function 'greatest' cannot be resolved due to ambiguous method parameters (null, null, null, null).

tests.name: test no parameters
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID STRING KEY) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, GREATEST() AS HIGHEST FROM INPUT;

tests.name: test trying to compare numeric and string
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID STRING KEY, NUM INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='json');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, GREATEST(ID, NUM) AS HIGHEST FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Function 'greatest' does not accept parameters (STRING, INTEGER).

statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID STRING KEY, NUM INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='json');
